rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area that serves as the living room, dining space, and includes a designated section for a library. The area is minimalist in design with clean lines and neutral colors.
rooms.vastu_considerations: The living area should be located in the east or north part of the apartment to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Features include modern appliances, ample counter space and storage solutions. The design emphasizes minimalism with functional layout.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Placing the kitchen in a north or northeast corner of the living area is recommended to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom designed for rest and relaxation. Minimalist decor with built-in storage and natural lighting.
rooms.vastu_considerations: The master bedroom should be located in the south or west area of the apartment to promote restful sleep.

rooms.description: A simple, functional bedroom space designed for additional family members. The room is minimalist with essential storage.
rooms.vastu_considerations: This bedroom can be placed in the north or east direction for a calm environment.

rooms.description: The smallest room of the apartment, intended as a guest room. Minimalist design and functional layout.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Guest bedroom should be in the east or north to encourage positive energy.

rooms.description: A modern bathroom with essential fixtures. The design is minimalist and emphasizes ease of maintenance.
rooms.vastu_considerations: Bathrooms are preferably placed in the south or west areas as per Vastu.
